item.description:
I'm part of another meetup that has decided to attend the 2013 Inauguration. Here are the details below if anyone would like to attend this historic event.

The link to the trip is below:
http://mypages.netopia.com/blackcomedy/presidentbarackobamainauguration2013/
Trip includes:
- Round trip transportation,
- 1 NIGHT HOTEL ACCOMMODATIONS - EISENHOWER RESORT http://www.eisenhower.com/
- Gala Presidential Dinner- all you can eat Southern Style Buffet
- Pre-Inauguration Gala celebration-all black upscale attire
- Champagne toast for the President
- Transfer to the Inauguration event in DC

Prices: Double $250
Triples $240
Quad $225
Children $175 (with 2 adults @ double rat
item.name: Inauguration 2013-Washington D.C.
